name: Wake Up Call: Sweet Beet Juice
description: When beets are pushed through a juicer and removed of their outer layers, the resulting juice is sweet, fresh and packed with vitamins. Diluted with apple juice and brightened up with a spritz of orange, and it's an even better way to start the day.

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the beets and apples into chunks that will fit into the juicer.
Alternating between the beets and the apples, push through the juicer and into a cup.
Divide the juice between two cups and serve with orange wedges.
